section.title: Top-level of CellML Files
section.para: The top-level element information item in a CellML File MUST be an element information item in the CellML 1.1 namespace, with local name model. This element information item is referred to in this specification as the model element.

listitem.para: Every model element MUST contain a name attribute in the empty namespace. The value of the name attribute MUST be a valid CellML identifier, and SHALL be interpreted as a unique identifier for the model.

In addition, a model element MAY contain zero or more specific information item children, each of which MUST be of one of the following types:
a component element information item
a connection element information item
a group element information item
an import element information item
a units element information item
